channel.title: Change Autosender at logins
channel.description:
Hello all, I am new at Moparscape forums and I am creating a server.
First of all, my source is RS2HD my client is PkzEvolutionScape 562.
Okay.. well.
As you can probally know, when I login, It`s wrote Welcome to PkzEvolutionScape 562 Make sure you have the right client downloaded [...] etc.
Now, i looked at Autosender and some others too and I wasn't able to find with Search : Welcome to [...]
I tried many times but really can't find... Where can I change it ?
Would be appriciated ! :)

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @Soz_U_Dead Soz U Dead
item.description:
@Soz_U_Dead wrote:

Thanks guyz to help me,

I tried the Notes one, and It is not in there.

Now, I looks in Data / Scripts .

I see

Potion.py
Bones.py
Food.py
Teletabs.py
commands_admin.py
global.py

and Authentification.py…

but theres a problem… I can’t open it… cause it is in .py
I can’t edit.

EDIT : W000000t, IT WORKS… I CHANGED THE TYPE OF FILE FOR java, Yeahh Thank you SO MUCH Karlis95. ! Thanks to all who tried to help me too… I appreciate it … Yayy !

Read full topic

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

might be in Notes.java called by Notes();

Read full topic

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @Karlis95 Karlis95
item.description:
@Karlis95 wrote:

[quote=“Soz U Dead, post:1, topic:341449”]Hello all, I am new at Moparscape forums and I am creating a server.

First of all, my source is RS2HD
my client is PkzEvolutionScape 562.

Okay… well.

As you can probally know, when I login, It`s wrote
Welcome to PkzEvolutionScape 562
Make sure you have the right client downloaded […]
etc.

Now, i looked at Autosender and some others too and I wasn’t able to find with Search : Welcome to […]

I tried many times but really can’t find… Where can I change it ?

Would be appriciated ! :)[/quote]

Go to Source > Data > Scripts > Authentication ( or nvm ) Open Scrool down and Done. Enjoy!

Read full topic

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @Soz_U_Dead Soz U Dead
item.description:
@Soz_U_Dead wrote:

That’s too long, and i did Search for Welcome To … In the ActionSender, I also do it in my whole file. The only thing I can see is :

ScriptManager.getInstance().call("login", player); Notes(); if(player.starter == 0) { player.getInventory().addItem(995, 2000000); player.getInventory().addItem(10400, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(10402, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(9005, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(1052, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(7459, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(853, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(861, 1); player.getInventory().addItem(884, 100); player.getInventory().addItem(892, 100); player.getInventory().addItem(1323, 1); 
	player.starter = 1;
	player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Type ::yell ,  To talk to Everyone.");
	player.getActionSender().sendMessage("Also do ::rules !");
	}</blockquote>

That’s what you got when you create an account and the Autosend… Not the Welcome and blah blah. :S

Read full topic

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

show us the whole line.

Read full topic

item.title: Change Autosender at logins
item.dc:creator: @Soz_U_Dead Soz U Dead
item.description:
@Soz_U_Dead wrote:

[quote=“Soz U Dead, post:5, topic:341449”]ok, if I tell you it is not working…

First, I don’t see the Welcome to …

Second, I only see : Also check ::rules,

Btw i changed it… and it don’t work …[/quote]

Okay now I found autosender when you create account like, the items you get at the begenning… but the only thing that im not able to see, is the Welcome To … -.-

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“lildude783, post:4, topic:341449”]wow… l2program

its in the actionsender as a script… look into the script instance where it called the “login” method throughauthentication.py in your scripts[/quote]
This aint programming this is coding.

Read full topic
